title-group.article-title: H-STABILITY OF RUNGE-KUTTA METHODS WITH VARIABLE STEPSIZE FOR SYSTEM OF PANTOGRAPH EQUATIONS

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 2004 AMSS, Chinese Academy of Sciences and VSP

abstract.p: This paper deals with H-stability of Runge-Kutta methods with variable stepsize for the system of pantograph equations. It is shown that both Runge-Kutta methods with nonsingular matrix coefficient A and stiffly accurate Runge-Kutta methods are H-stable if and only if the modulus of stability function at infinity is less than 1.
